name: Ernest BANKS, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et. al., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Banks v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Ernest BANKS, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et. al., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 11th day of October, 2000, probable jurisdiction is herewith noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
761 A.2d 540
Ernest BANKS, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et. al., Appellee.
No. 83 M.D. Appeal Docket 2000.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 11, 2000.
